home.title: Store and manage all your links
home.description: Chopchop url is an open source project which allows to improve the user's link management. Log in to customize, manage and permanently store your links.
home.timeLimit: Links created without a personal account will be available for 24 hours.

notification.serverLoader: Please wait, as it is a proyect for practice it is deployed under the lowest budget it can take a moment to start on the beggining. Thanks for the visit! :D

createLink.errorToUrl: The destination URL is required. You have not entered a URL. E.g.: https://example.com
createLink.errorFromUrl: Please enter the desired domain or make it random. Minimun of 6 characters.
createLink.errorDescription: /300 You have exceeded the maximum number of characters.

errors.VL-0001: Error with the destination URL, it does not meet the format or has not been entered.
errors.VL-0002: Error with the entered domain, it must be more than 6 characters.
errors.VL-0003: Error with the description, the maximum length is 300 characters.
errors.VL-0004: Error with the password, the minimum must be 4 characters.
errors.VL-0005: Error with the maximum number of clicks, it must be greater than 0.
errors.CE-0001: Error, url already exists on your profile.
errors.SH-0001: Error, url you are looking for doesn't exists.
errors.SH-0003: Error, the link access limit has been reached.
